# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a new session.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init()
```

## Discussion

ARKit stops sessions when they’re deinitialized.

## Starting and stopping a session

- **run(_:)**: Runs a session with the data providers you supply.
- **stop()**: Stops all data providers running in this session.
- **ARKitSession.Error**: An error that might occur when running data providers on an ARKit session.
